events.title: First Sunday Carry-In Dinner
events.notes: Potluck lunch after the service. Bring a favorite dish if you like.

events.title: Blessing of the Animals
events.notes: Bring your pets for a special outdoor blessing.

events.title: Convocation Deans & Wardens
events.notes: Bishop Deon Johnson gathers with the Deans and Wardens of our four convocations (monthly, first Tuesday). Location: Zoom.

events.title: Diocesan LGBTQ+ Virtual Gathering
events.notes: New diocesan group meets monthly on the second Tuesday at 7 p.m. Email lgbtqiaministry@diocesemo.org for Zoom link.

events.title: 2025 Diocesan Picnic
events.notes: Day of faith, fun, and fellowship. Games, music, food, worship, nature activities for all ages.
events.location: Camp MoVal, 2659 Camp Mo-Val Rd, Union, MO 63084
